promo_title:
DISCOVER SHOES AND BAGS
THAT COMPLETE YOUR STYLE
promo_desc: Check out our wide range of shoes and bags, crafted in various styles to highlight your individuality and taste.
approach_desc: ShopSell creates designs at every step to make you feel special. We combine creativity with precision and aesthetics with functionality, focusing on timelessness rather than trends. Each of our shoes and bags is crafted from high-quality materials and finished with delicate details, making them ideal for both everyday and special occasions.

description: We offer shoes and bags for women, men, and children that match your taste and pride of use.
shipping_text: Enjoy free worldwide shipping on orders over 300 ₼.
secure_text: Your payment information is processed securely.
support_text: We are here to answer your questions from Monday to Friday.
discount_text: Sign up via email and save 25% on your next purchase.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
deliveryAnswer: 1-3 business days in Baku and surrounding areas, 3-7 business days in other regions.
paymentQuestion: How can I make a payment?
paymentAnswer: Payment can be made by card, bank transfer, or cash.
returnAnswer: Yes, returns are possible within 14 days, the product must be unused.
discountAnswer: Register via email to get an additional 25% discount.
qualityAnswer: All our products meet quality standards and are original.
heading: Payment Process
intro: The payment process at ShopSell is simple and secure. Follow the steps below:
firstText: Choose the products you want and add them to the cart.
secondText: Select one of the available payment options such as Visa, MasterCard, cash, or others.
thirdText: Complete the payment using the selected method. Payment confirmation will be sent via email or SMS.
note: For additional questions, contact customer support.
location_address: Our store is located at: Baku city, Nizami district, Bahruz Nuriyev street 529
faq1_answer: 1-3 business days in Baku and nearby regions, 3-7 days in other areas.
faq2_answer: Payment is possible by card, bank transfer, or cash.
faq3_answer: Yes, returns are possible within 14 days, the product must be unused.
faq4_answer: Register with your email to get an extra 25% discount.
faq5_answer: Free delivery is available for orders over 300 ₼.
faq6_answer: All our products comply with quality standards and are original.
payment_intro: The payment process at ShopSell is simple and secure. Follow the steps below:
payment_step1_text: Choose the products you want and add them to your cart.
payment_step2_text: Select one of the available methods: Visa, MasterCard, cash, or others.
payment_step3_text: Complete the payment with the selected method. Payment confirmation will be sent via email or SMS.
payment_footer_note: For additional questions, contact customer support.
return_intro: Returning orders at ShopSell is simple and convenient. Please follow the steps below to return a product.
return_step1_text: Keep the product unused and in its original packaging. Place the order receipt inside the product box.
return_step2_text: Contact +994 55 622 71 01 or send a message via our social media for returns.
return_step3_text: Send the product to the specified address or hand it over via courier.
return_step4_text: Once the returned product is confirmed, your payment will be refunded to your card account within 3-5 business days.
return_footer_note: For additional questions, contact customer support.
shipping_intro: The delivery process at ShopSell is simple and convenient. Follow the steps below:
shipping_step1_text: Add the selected products to your cart and complete the payment.
shipping_step2_text: After the payment is completed, you will receive a confirmation via email or SMS.
shipping_step3_text: Products are delivered within 1-3 business days in Baku and 3-7 business days in other regions.
shipping_footer_note: For additional questions, contact customer support.
privacy_intro: At ShopSell, your personal data is important to us. Below are the main points about data collection, protection, and usage:
privacy_point1_text: Information such as name, email, phone number, and delivery address is collected for order and payment purposes.
privacy_point2_text: All personal data is stored encrypted and is not shared with third parties.
privacy_point3_text: Collected data is used only for order processing, customer support, and site improvement purposes.
privacy_footer_note: For additional questions, contact customer support.
support_intro: At ShopSell, we are always ready to assist you. You can contact us following the steps below:
support_step1_text: You can contact us via phone (+994 55 622 71 01), email, or social networks.
support_step2_text: Fill out the request form on the website to send us a message about any issue or question.
support_step3_text: Once your request is received, our customer support team will contact you as soon as possible.
support_footer_note: For faster response, please provide a complete and detailed request.
terms_intro: Before shopping at ShopSell, please familiarize yourself with the website rules and conditions:
terms_rule1_text: By using the site, you agree to comply with ShopSell's rules.
terms_rule2_text: Orders are only active for registered users. Enter correct information when selecting products and making payments.
terms_rule3_text: Payments are only accepted via approved payment methods. Orders are not processed until payment is completed.
terms_rule4_text: Products are delivered to the specified address and can be returned according to the return policy.
terms_footer_note: For additional questions, please contact customer support.
